channel.title: Everyone else can login but me, and im hoster
channel.description:
ok im hosting my own server, and everyone else can connect so i obviously did portforwarding properly, but i cant login, when i attempt to login this is the error on the run.bat that i get.
[code]Connection from user-3o7klplg2e.gateway.2wire.net:3761 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:10297) at client.run(client.java:19254) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (user-3o7klplg2e.gateway.2wire.net)[/code]
can someone please help? i spent almost 4 days now trying to fix it.

item.title: Everyone else can login but me, and im hoster
item.dc:creator: @Jonnydpickle Jonnydpickle
item.description:
@Jonnydpickle wrote:

What do you mean he couldnt post the client?

He edits it jars it
then edits it to local host that simple.

Read full topic
item.source: Everyone else can login but me, and im hoster

item.title: Everyone else can login but me, and im hoster
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

The server is accepting the connecting, that means whatever Ip he is using is at least connecting to the server. I would actually advise you to use your default gateway as the Ip, sometimes the socket doesn’t like the connecting host, so it closes the connection, Try localhost(127.0.0.1) if that doesn’t work, try your default gateway.

Read full topic
item.source: Everyone else can login but me, and im hoster

item.title: Everyone else can login but me, and im hoster
item.dc:creator: @Jonnydpickle Jonnydpickle
item.description:
@Jonnydpickle wrote:

That or…
Ur not connecting with local host…

In the client instead of ur servers ip make it ‘local host’ ‘127.0.0.1’ ‘0.0.0.0’

Read full topic

dont ask.
